model.entities.staticEntity

Class StaticEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entities.Entity
      • model.entities.staticEntity.StaticEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CollidableEntity

    public abstract class StaticEntity
extends Entity
    Represents a static entity which is an entity in the game world that cannot be moved and may need to be checked for collision.
    Author:
    Marcel van Workum - 300313949
